desc: Hair Carnival - A place for fun! Life is a rollercoaster, but that doesn’t mean your hair has to get messy! We make unique, limited edition, one-of-a-kind hair scrunchies in small batches, so you know you’ll be wearing something special.

layout.text: Hello funseekers! It's time to get ready for anything, with your hair and hands up, riding on this rollercoaster that we call life!
